plot: A young girl is mistreated by her stepmother while her half-brother is favored. When she discovers a magical orange tree, her stepmother get mad with jealousy & seeks to get the magical tree for herself.
title: Tango Mango
plot_es: A young girl is mistreated by her stepmother while her half-brother is favored. When she discovers a magical orange tree, her stepmother get mad with jealousy & seeks to get the magical tree for herself.
plot_en: A young girl is mistreated by her stepmother while her half-brother is favored. When she discovers a magical orange tree, her stepmother get mad with jealousy & seeks to get the magical tree for herself.
